CScaleFilter
public
IImageFilter
public
CRefCount
CScaleFilter

Defines an image filter that resizes an image

Image Filter Parameters
"ScaleX" : float

Scaling factor in X direction

"ScaleY" : float

Scaling factor in Y direction

"ScaleUpMode" : <EScaleUpMode>

Sampling mode to use when scaling up

"ScaleDownMode" : <EScaleDownMode>

Sampling mode to use when scaling down

Functions
CreateScale
CRefObj<IImageFilter> CreateScale()

Creates an image scale filter.

Returns

Returns the newly created filter.
